title: Captivated
description: When Darla's cousin Vinnie screws up, yet again, it lands her in the cage of the local 'Dragons' motorcycle club. Livid, she demands to be set free immediately, refusing to give into the effect one biker has on her in particular. When she's offered a deal in exchange for Vinnie's safety despite him losing the club's shipment and disappearing, Darla takes it, but try as she might, Link's effect on her starts to wear at her resistance while she works to pay off her cousin's debt.A 60 pg standalone, Biker Romance novelette
author: Ella Elias
